contentrichtext.text: {{unreferenced|date=March 2012}} [[Image:Muralmarti1642zu1.jpg|220px|thumb|right|Mural de les [[JERC]] de [[Sabadell]]]] '''The Young Republican Left of Catalonia''' (in [[Catalan language|Catalan]]: ''Joventuts d'Esquerra Republicana de Catalunya'', JERC) is the youth wing of the political party [[Republican Left of Catalonia]] (in [[Catalan language|Catalan]]: ''Esquerra Republicana de Catalunya'', ERC). According to their principles declaration, their aim is "attaining a democratic society, in which any sign of social or national oppression had disappeared within an ecologically equilibrated territory, by bringing awareness and mobilizing the youth of the ''[[Països Catalans]]''. One of their main activities is an [[Catalan independentism|independentist]] festival, ''Acampada Jove'', which every year congregates hundreds of Catalan independentist youngsters. Their current spokesperson is Gerard Gómez Their publication is the magazine ''LA VEU del jovent'' (Voice of the Youngster).
